languages.text: "Ха! Отличная шутка, шерин! Подумать только, союз людей и ксеносов... это же ведь шутка, да?"
"Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"
languages.original_text: "Ха! Отличная шутка, шерин! Подумать только, союз людей и ксеносов... это же ведь шутка, да?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and maadari... that's a joke, right?"
"Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and maadari... that's a joke, right?"
"Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

languages.text: “哈！这玩笑太有趣了，亲爱的！想想看，人类和异形居然结成了同盟……你确实是在开玩笑吧？”
languages.original_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

traits.locale_text: “哈！这玩笑太有趣了，亲爱的！想想看，人类和异形居然结成了同盟……你确实是在开玩笑吧？”

languages.text: 「はっ！冗談にもほどがあるわ、シャリーン！夢物語もいいところよ。人間と異種族との同盟なんて…冗談でしょう？」
languages.original_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

traits.locale_text: 「はっ！冗談にもほどがあるわ、シャリーン！夢物語もいいところよ。人間と異種族との同盟なんて…冗談でしょう？」

languages.text: "Ha! Guter Witz, Shereen! Man stelle sich vor, eine Allianz von Menschen und Xenos ... Es ist doch ein Witz, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Guter Witz, Shereen! Man stelle sich vor, eine Allianz von Menschen und Xenos ... Es ist doch ein Witz, oder?"

languages.text: « Ha ! Quel sens de l'humour, shereen ! Une alliance entre humains et xénos, imaginez un peu ça... C'est une plaisanterie n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

traits.locale_text: « Ha ! Quel sens de l'humour, shereen ! Une alliance entre humains et xénos, imaginez un peu ça... C'est une plaisanterie n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: «¡Ja! ¡Qué ocurrente, shereen! Imagine, una alianza de humanos y xenos... Porque es broma, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Ja! ¡Qué ocurrente, shereen! Imagine, una alianza de humanos y xenos... Porque es broma, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: "Ha! Çok komiksin şirinim! Düşünsene, insanlar ve zenolar ittifak kuracakmış... Şaka yaptın, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "Ha! Great joke, shereen! Just fancy that, an alliance of humans and xenos... That's a joke, right?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha! Çok komiksin şirinim! Düşünsene, insanlar ve zenolar ittifak kuracakmış... Şaka yaptın, değil mi?"
